questions.solution:
Ans. C) 8 times

 

According to Poiseuille's law:

 

 

in which F is the rate of blood flow, ‚àÜP is the pressure difference between the ends of the vessel, r is the radius of the vessel, l is length of the vessel, and h is viscosity of the blood.

 

Therefore, blood flow (F) inside the vessel is
